400.friendly: Oops! Your request couldn’t be understood. Please check and try again.

401.friendly: You're not logged in or authorized to see this page.

403.friendly: You don't have permission to access this content.

404.friendly: Sorry, we couldn’t find what you were looking for.

405.friendly: This action isn’t allowed on this page.

408.friendly: It’s taking too long. Try again in a moment!

409.friendly: There’s a conflict in your request. Please refresh or check again.

410.friendly: This content is no longer available.

411.friendly: We need to know how much data you're sending. Try again with content length.

413.friendly: That’s a big upload! Try a smaller file.

414.friendly: The link is too long. Something went wrong with the request.

415.friendly: We can’t process that file format.

429.friendly: You’re going too fast! Please wait a bit before trying again.

500.friendly: Something went wrong on our side. We ask for your understanding. We’re fixing it!

501.friendly: This feature isn’t ready yet. Please check back later.

502.friendly: There’s a communication issue between servers. Hang tight!

503.message: This service is not available now.

504.friendly: The server took too long to respond. Try again in a bit.

505.friendly: Your browser or request version isn’t supported.

511.friendly: Please connect to a network or sign in to proceed.
